context: Mature GPS/GNSS market with expanding applications in precision agriculture, construction automation, and geospatial analytics. Trimble had evolved from GPS pioneer to integrated technology solutions provider across multiple verticals including agriculture, construction, and surveying.

competitors.name: Topcon Positioning Systems
competitors.notes: Global leader in positioning technology for surveying, construction, agriculture with high-quality products

competitors.name: Leica Geosystems
competitors.notes: Major competitor in surveying and construction equipment/software in geospatial market

competitors.name: Hexagon AB
competitors.notes: Competitor in construction technology with hardware and software solutions for machine control and surveying

competitors.name: Deere & Company
competitors.notes: Significant competitor in agriculture with precision agriculture technologies (NavCom Technology)

competitors.name: Raven Applied Technology
competitors.notes: Specializes in automated and autonomous farm technologies, guidance and steering technologies

competitors.name: Farmers Edge
competitors.notes: Competitor in agriculture technology and precision farming solutions

competitors.name: Hemisphere GNSS
competitors.notes: Provider of GNSS solutions for surveying, construction, and agriculture industries

competitors.name: Esri
competitors.notes: Key rival in geospatial industry offering advanced GIS software

competitors.name: Autodesk
competitors.notes: Competes in software solutions for design and modeling

competitors.name: Carlson
competitors.notes: Offers surveying and civil engineering software and hardware

competitors.name: HERE Technologies
competitors.notes: Competitor in location-based services and mapping
